# UICollectionViewFlowLayout.SectionInsetReference.fromSafeArea

**Case**

Section insets are defined in relation to the safe area of the layout.

## Declaration

```swift
case fromSafeArea
```

## Constants

- **UICollectionViewFlowLayout.SectionInsetReference.fromContentInset**: Section insets are defined in relation to the collection view’s content inset.
- **UICollectionViewFlowLayout.SectionInsetReference.fromLayoutMargins**: Section insets are defined in relation to the margins of the layout.

items.description: Section insets are defined in relation to the collection view’s content inset.

items.description: Section insets are defined in relation to the margins of the layout.
